description: Dashboard for Spring Boot2 Statistics(by micrometer-prometheus).

reduceOptions.fields: /^hikaricp_connections_timeout_total{app="orders", app_kubernetes_io_instance="mushop", app_kubernetes_io_name="orders", instance="10.1.0.72:80", job="kubernetes-pods", kubernetes_namespace="mushop", kubernetes_pod_name="mushop-orders-67bb8f45c8-5cr5p", mockmode="false", pod_template_hash="67bb8f45c8", pool="HikariPool-1", version="local"}$/

panels.title: Wait queue for a connection from the pool

targets.expr: irate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{instance="$instance", application="$application", exception="None", uri!~".*actuator.*"}[5m]) / irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{instance="$instance", application="$application", exception="None", uri!~".*actuator.*"}[5m])

title: Spring Boot Statistics & Endpoint Metrics
